tooltip.gaiacore.gaia_scanner: The §5Gaia Scanner§r scans for §5Gaia Cores§r when held. It will beep at a rate that increases the closer you are to a core. Shift-right-clicking a §5Gaia Core§r with the scanner will store information about that core which can be analyzed in a §lGaia Core Analyzer§r
tooltip.gaiacore.gaia_core: §5Gaia Cores§r can be found around the world and generates different resources depending on the type of core, assuming that the correct fuel and/or conditions are provided.
tooltip.gaiacore.energetic_gaia_core: §9Energetic§r §5Gaia Cores§r will spawn basic ores on each non-occupied side when powered
tooltip.gaiacore.volcanic_gaia_core: When all but one side is covered in Molten Signalum, §cVolcanic§r §5Gaia Cores§r will spawn lava on the non-occupied side
